item.title: Hugo Loves Rst
item.description: Main Title This is a title. This is a subtitle, and some math. \begin{equation*} dz = \frac{\partial z}{\partial x}dx + \frac{\partial z}{\partial y}dy \end{equation*} \begin{equation*} \begin{bmatrix} x_{11} & x_{12} & x_{13} & \dots & x_{1n} \\ x_{21} & x_{22} & x_{23} & \dots & x_{2n} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ x_{d1} & x_{d2} & x_{d3} & \dots & x_{dn} \end{bmatrix} \end{equation*} \begin{equation*} \max{|x_k^{(1)}-a^{(1)}|, \ldots ,|x_k^{(n)}-a^{(n)}|} \leq ||X_k - A|| \leq \sum{i=1}^k |x_k^{(i)}-a^{(i)}| \end{equation*} Some lists but some text first Some text.
